package com.entity;

public class Bulkheadrukudata {
private String buno;
private String amount;
private String buname;
public Bulkheadrukudata(String buno, String amount, String buname) {
	super();
	this.buno = buno;
	this.amount = amount;
	this.buname = buname;
}
public Bulkheadrukudata() {
	super();
	// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
}
public String getBuno() {
	return buno;
}
public void setBuno(String buno) {
	this.buno = buno;
}
public String getAmount() {
	return amount;
}
public void setAmount(String amount) {
	this.amount = amount;
}
public String getBuname() {
	return buname;
}
public void setBuname(String buname) {
	this.buname = buname;
}
@Override
public String toString() {
	return "Bulkhead_ind_ruku [buno=" + buno + ", amount=" + amount
			+ ", buname=" + buname + "]";
}

}


package com.dao.show;

import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.List;

import org.apache.commons.dbutils.QueryRunner;
import org.apache.commons.dbutils.handlers.BeanListHandler;
import com.entity.Bulkheadrukudata;
import com.util.JdbcUtil;

public class ShowBulkheadrukuDaoImpl implements ShowBulkheadrukuDao {

	public List<Bulkheadrukudata> showData(String tablename) {
		try {
			QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtil.getDataSource());
			String sql = "SELECT * FROM "+tablename+" ";
			return (List<Bulkheadrukudata>)qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Bulkheadrukudata.class));
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			throw new RuntimeException(e);
		}
	}

}
